review: Controls are poorly optimised (right hand controller is actually the left hand). Entire text is in chinese but voice overs are English. There is no menu to change graphics and language settings (although I can't tell because everything is in Chinese).

author: {'steamid': '76561198102886038', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1494609881}
review:
This is a on rails VR shooter that unfortunatly isn't very fun. The gameplay in general is very limited, basically point and shoot at the enemies that don't really do much against you, they just mostly float around until you kill them, not very engaging or fun. The voice acting is pretty subpar, sounds design doesn't sound very punchy or noticeable, and at times there's no sound at all when there should be. 

Guess it looks nice though.

Overall there isn't much to say, it's not bad persay, but there's nothing fun or engaging about it, and if you can't make something fun in VR, well then what's the point of making it in VR in the first place?

author: {'steamid': '76561198122849392', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1494587579}
review: je vai faire un bref compte rendu sur ce jeux,d'abord on nous propose deux option differente mais vu que c'est en chinois impossible de savoir la difference ,je clique sur premier choix et la le jeu demarre par une cinematique ou de nombreux vaisseaux de grande taille s'affronte ,cinematique qui aurai pu etres de toutes beautee s'il n'y avez pas de saccades et ralentissement atroce ,puis la partie commence par un tuto ou on porte deux grosse arme qui semble etres des canon enorme mais qu'il semble relier a notre corps c'est tres bizarre ,le but est de nous montrer le fonctionnement des move  ,il y a un tir facon mitraillette ,un lazer une fois ramassee un bonus ,des missiles et un bouclier qui sd'utulise avec les pad circulaire (haut et bas ) juste apres le tuto le jeux a crasher 2 fois .pour l'instant je le deconseille vivement tant que la fluidite et les crash sont present ,l'audio est traduit en anglais mais pas l'interface ??? tres bizarre .je possede une 980 ti qui devrai le faire tourner sans probleme .le prix est honnete mais si le jeux n'est pas jouable quel est l(interet .bref encore une demande de remboursement ,plein le cul

author: {'steamid': '76561198273576868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1, 'last_played': 1543739443}
review:
国产VR游戏，抱着必须支持国产的心态买了，毕竟25的价格也不是很贵，体验过了，就给其他玩家一些自己的感受吧
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[h1] 感兴趣的朋友可以先看我的评测视频哦~
视频地址：http://www.bilibili.com/video/av10501335/ [/h1]

这款游戏是以中文字幕配英文解说的形式，进入游戏会有一大段的剧情作为游戏的背景，个人感觉有点长，需要耐心的等待，进入游戏之后会有一个练习教程
[h1] 操作很简单：扳机射击，触控板前端是护甲，后端是炮弹 [/h1]

游戏分了好多关卡，虽然没过通关，但是体验前几关就知道后面的管卡，飞船是自己移动的，你需要的就是无休止的打敌人的飞船，从操控的角度来说很简单，没有任何障碍，但是这也会让人觉得玩几关就没有继续的冲动，建议在关卡上可以再优化

还有进入游戏之后会让你觉得游戏中枪和自己的手柄有一定的距离，我以为是刚开始手柄飘了，然而进入游戏也是这样，那我的理解就是我应该是以飞船的角色在对战，武器是在机翼两旁，但是，瞄准操控会有一些难。

还有就是画面，有点粗糙，可能星球这种庞大的题材本生就不容易做吧，也建议再优化一下

我玩了之后眩晕感还好，但是我的朋友觉得玩过之后有点眩晕，我觉得应该是飞船在不断的移动的缘故，也是建议开发再优化。

大致上自己的感受就是这些啦，这款游戏总体来说还可以，但是，需要优化和改进的地方也不少，所以，10分我给5.5分，有不足才有进步的空间嘛，也希望游戏优化能越来越好，国产VR游戏也能再多一些！

author: {'steamid': '76561198258022771', 'num_games_owned': 1061, 'num_reviews': 335, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1494579817}
review:
The graphics are not bad,  English voice-acting is quite good, music well chosen.
Gameplay of this railshooter is very limited :  don't think, shoot in the direction of the squares (enemy ships) until they explode, that's it.  Very repetitive. After a level is finished: try to guess what the Chinese interface is asking you.
For me, the abundance of space ships (big and large), meteors and planets, the HUD, the insanely big guns you have... it's all a bit too much info for me :).   I think Gunjack is a much better choice if you like this type of game.  But the price is low so if you are desperate for a new simple VR shooter that requires no thinking or skills, you might enjoy this game.
